Package org.jacktheclipper.frontend.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExceptionHandlingController
    This class offers a central place to manage all exceptions.
    LegalController
    Responsible for the impressum and privacypolicy.
    LoginController
    Serves a login page for every organization.
    RegistrationController
    Handles the registration process with the backend
    StaffChiefController  
    SysAdminController
    This class handles all pages that are exclusive to a user with the role SystemAdministrator.
    UIController Deprecated
    UserConfigController
    This class covers all pages that a normal user needs to edit his settings.
    UserController
    Handles all requests where a user does not want to edit anything.
